price: 39. Yalli Nabii Suleymaanak iyyeh; tah Ni-mattaccook faxxa marah keenik acuy, hinnay keenik faxxa marak waas, wohul cisab koi mayanak.
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
